TSetupData *  gSetup 
) [private, virtual]

The big kahuna. Overload this in the derived class and it will be called for each event.

Parameters:
gData Pointer to current map of all TPIs [ WILL CHANGE SHORTLY ]
gSetup Pointer to TSetupData for this run [ WILL CHANGE SHORTLY ]
Returns:
0 on success and non-zero on failure

Reimplemented from BaseModule.

00040   // Prepare a few variables

00047     
00048     // Get the bank and detector names for this detector
00049     bankname = it->first;
00050     detname = setup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00051 
00052     // Create the pulse candidate finder for this detector
00053     PulseCandidateFinder* pulse_candidate_finder = new PulseCandidateFinder(detname, fOpts);  
00054 
00055     // Get the TPIs
00056     thePulseIslands = it->second;
00057     if (thePulseIslands.size() == 0) continue; // no pulses here..
00058 
00059     // Create the histogram that will store all the parameter values that we will look at to determine the best values
00060     if (fParameterHistograms.find(detname) == fParameterHistograms.end()) {
00061       int max_value = 10000;
00062       std::string histname = "fParameterHistogram_" + detname;
00063       TH1D* histogram = new TH1D(histname.c_str(), histname.c_str(), max_value, 0, max_value);
00064       fParameterHistograms[detname] = histogram;
00065     }
00066 
00067     // Get the parameter histogram for this detector
00068     TH1D* parameter_histogram = fParameterHistograms[detname];
00069 
00070     // Loop through all the pulses
00071     for (PulseIslandList::iterator pulseIter = thePulseIslands.begin(); pulseIter != thePulseIslands.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00072 
00073       // Find the pulse candidates on this TPulseIsland and then fill the parameter histogram
00074       pulse_candidate_finder->FindPulseCandidates(*pulseIter);
00075       pulse_candidate_finder->FillParameterHistogram(parameter_histogram);
00076 
00077       // Use to export pulses (NB you will only want to run rootana on a few events to stop the output being large)
00078       int n_pulse_candidates = pulse_candidate_finder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00079       if (Debug()) {
00080         if (n_pulse_candidates > 0) {
00081           //      ExportPulse::Instance()->AddToExportList(detname, pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin());
00082           if (n_pulse_candidates > 1) {
00083             std::cout << detname << "(" << bankname << "): Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " has " << n_pulse_candidates << " pulse candidates\n"; 
00084           }
00085         }
00086       } // end if Debug
00087     } // end loop through pulses
00088   } //  end loop through detectors
00089 
00090   return 0;

) [inherited]

Method called by the main event loop for each entry in the input root tree. Does some simple work, then hooks into the derived class through ProcessEntry.
